ç†±é–€è©•è«–.text: Must try breakfast sandwich shop popular amongst the local Taiwanese. This restaurant chains have been running for decades and is a local favorite. Affordable and quick sandwich + coffee/milk tea before rush hour.

Hands down to this little gem! Is def a joke in the wall type of breakfast spot! Everything on the menu is delicious! Their soy milk is so yum, their sandwiches are just so flavorful! This is our go to spot every morning!
Itâ€™s tasty.

Ordered a Korean butter toast and a hot pressed toast
The Korean butter toast is more delicious. The hot-pressed taste is similar to the hot-pressed one at 711. Although the price is similar, the taste should be similar.
Korean butter toast has a little bit of vegetables in it, plus the sauce, it will make you remember a little bit after eating it.

The attitude of the staff is bad. Even if there are free seats, they still insist on not allowing customers to dine in. After ordering and paying, they still say that the food has been packaged and can only be taken away. Can you tell me where you want to eat? Itâ€™s a very frustrating dining experienceğŸ™ˆ

The products are not too special, and are also quite expensive. What makes this store a horrible experience is the service staff, who is extremely rude and unprofessional. The whole time we were browsing, she was following us around, not to help us but to keep a close watch on us. I believe she suspected we were going to steal the items. When we looked at her, she narrowed her eyes and glared at us. Her attitude at the checkout was also very unfriendly. In addition, we purchased some fragile items, which were not wrapped and packaged properly. In other stores, wrapping the fragile items would be the bare minimum; however, this store does not seem to care about its customers whatsoever. Do yourselves a favour and go to other stores, where you can find the same or similar items.

The service staff are very friendly and can explain creative products very clearly. Wearing various cultural and creative products can highlight your personal characteristics and exude a literary and artistic atmosphere. Accessories for electronic products, such as products from ADATA and UAG, are also available They are all very useful and have been specially selected by the store. Remember to look for Sharon when you go shopping here!
No matter whether itâ€™s sunny or rainy, itâ€™s a pleasant thing to enjoy coffee and delicious food here after youâ€™re tired of shopping.

The quality of the products in the store is very high, but the quality of one of the store employees is very poor. A middle-aged woman with short hair permed and curled, wearing a hairband-style headband today. Not only for me and my friends, but also for urging and correcting customers on how they should treat the products (no one damaged them), how they should look, where they should stand, and if they think the customers are thinking too long...
When we responded to her, she not only ignored us, but even stood very close to us and treated the guests with a very unfriendly tone and eyes.
It is recommended that other people who want to patronize this store look at the door to see if this person is in the store, and if so, do not go in.

I just wanted to take a picture of the laptop bag to show to my friends, and I wanted to ask about the color.
As a result, I was chased away by the clerk inside (with short black hair, makeup, eyeliner, and a mask).
The product does not have a sign saying please do not take photos.
The result is that the price is 1980 and the quality is not bad.
Mood is directly affected
I have no desire to buy at all

A nice cafe, but the food is very overpriced, and I was disappointed at the portion size. Looking at what other people ate, it seems the pizza was one of the smaller dishes, but NTD200 for that is ridiculous.

A nice place to stop for a coffee with friends, but if you want a meal, I'd advise going elsewhere.
Ate here when we visited the creative park. Pleasant staff, peaceful atmosphere. The food is not too bad. We especially enjoyed the cinnamon roll with ice cream for dessert.

Quite a charming place to stop for coffee, tea or cakes.

We liked the black ruby tea cheesecake and the rum creme brulee - both were tasty.  The honey citron tea was nice but a tad sweet, while the Taiwan premium black ruby tea was good.

They have a current promotion â€” If you buy a non alcoholic drink, you can get $30 off if you add a cake.

The service is excellent and the crew is very attentive and kind. They topped up my hot water twice without even me asking. They also brought drinking water once I got seated. Great place to people-watch and rest your legs after all shopping around.
Resturant found in Huangshan park. Named after the film by hou hsiao hsien. The cafe food is alright nothing spectacular. Staff were okay. Atmoshphere is decent but seating can be cramped

Good indie films and great projection quality, but some of the seats like in row 3-3,3-5,3-7 smells like some unwashed homeless person decided to pee themselves there. God it was so awful to sit there.

Please wash the upholstery. Iâ€™d like to enjoy movies here without need to constantly find pockets where the seats smell doesnâ€™t make me gag.

The screen and sound quality is fine but the seats are awful! They slope downwards and are clearly old and haven't been refurbished either. Watching a movie at this cinema is so unpleasant and uncomfortable.

Love this independent cinema, they screen curated films and the crew is very friendly. The place is very tidy and bathrooms are clean. Movies start on time and they play a few trailers before the start time. Sometimes there are collaboration with local film-makers and they set up a booth outside the cinema.
A movie theater that plays international independent films and also supports local films.
Lovely little theatre in the Huashan Creative Park. Usually a good selection of both popular, revival, and independent films at a low price.
The barâ€™s got a vibrant vibe. A great nighttime hangout place as they have a decent selection of whiskey and cocktails.

super big tweet
The atmosphere is absolutely perfect
The wine looks good and tastes good
You can sing on weekdays
Super relaxing

The bartending is very special and delicious
The atmosphere is also very comfortable and a place where you can sing â¤ï¸

Great wine, great atmosphere, funny store manager
Even if the store manager is handsome, he still looks very impressive to me.

Congratulations! The decoration looks very comfortable. The drinks are also great
You can also sing in your leisure time!

A good place in this street full of bubble tea shop. The service is quick and the guy is nice and he speaks English!
I ordered their top 3, tea with milk ans it was really good!
Prices are reasonable and they have many options

A drink stand in front of Guanghwa International Electronic Plaza.
A valuable shop where you can use icash.
I drank papaya milk and it was delicious.
It takes a surprisingly long time if there is a line.
In the past, there used to be a store selling media such as DVD-Rs and CD-Rs on the street.

I wanted something hot and refreshing, so I chose the most popular lemon tea. The male clerk seemed to be busy by himself, but he was very kind to me even though I didn't speak the language, and the lemon tea was delicious. If I have a chance to go nearby, I will definitely go again.

Papaya milk is delicious and highly recommended
There is a male employee who is very nice but not sure who he is.
Rose frozen lemon drink is really effective for diarrhea XD Awesome!

Itâ€™s 18:17. Are you ready?
Wait until I come back before 18:00 from buying grandmaâ€™s scallion pancakes next door
Can't wait for you yet
Five stars for the grandma next door

(Tourist)
I love Tamashii product so it was great to see a store in person even though Taipei is full of retailers selling similar stock.

Since it's the flagship store, you'll find some exclusive product. The prices seemed good (I'm a UK tourist) but ever so slightly more than Japan (maybe due to exchange rates).

There was good stock of stuff I can't always find online, so I'm quite jealous of Taiwanese locals!

Something that I didn't like is maintenance of the store is lacking. Products were dusty and the Tamashii logo outside was also incredibly dusty. Please dust your store every week at least! The general store layout was good, however.

Note, if you also collect the Brown shipper box, I don't know if they keep them or dispose. Personally I like to keep mine, so it's worth asking them if they have it.
It was full of SH.Figuarts I couldn't pick
Nice place
I really want to thank the official for giving those of us who want to buy the collection at the original price the opportunity to do so!

It's really nice to buy the Gundam I like, and the store clerk has a good service attitude.
Recommended places to travel!

It is a very quiet and private space. There are sacred wood incense and singing bowls to help relax the body and mind. The classrooms are maintained and the teachers are attentive to teaching. There are also assistive devices for useğŸ§¡Recommend one

We ordered the carrot cake & egg (number 5, NT 40) and the corn pancake roll (set six - NT 65) and changed the red tea to milk tea (with additional NT 5) and we love it! Portion was just nice (we are small eaters) and the staff was so friendly. Thereâ€™re so many cute drawings on the wall but we couldnâ€™t seem to find the cat! Itâ€™s a very cute neighbourhood breakfast shop and we most certainly will come back again â˜ºï¸

Truly a hole in a wall breakfast experience! The back is air-conditioned. Just write your orders on the paper and pass to them.

Their offerings are interesting and the normal fare the Taiwanese people eat, I suppose itâ€™s their western kind.

Really love this mum and pop shop. Specifically came for Scallion Spring Onion Pancake. I've been looking for it everywhere and I like that it is warm and crispy. Keep in mind it takes a while to make like 15-20mins. Also they weren't open on a Monday morning when I went, even though Google says they are.

Very typical TW breakfast shop type of setting.
There are seating area in and outside the shop.
Lots of combination to choose from.
I had set A for 3 days in a row, cheese burger with egg TW style.
U can choose the drink u want, just top up the difference.
The fried rice is nice, tepanyaki style and the boss fried the rice when u order.
I always like local TW style breakfast shop.
They are mostly cheap and good.
Give this a try and hope u like it.
Great food for a very good cost. My favorite was the sausage fried rice. The shop is easily located in Ximending. Service is okay even though the owners don't speak english.

We visited on a Sunday night when it was pleasantly quiet. The space is roomy with a great vibe. The staff were friendly, and the food and drinks hit the spot. We ended up having such a good time that we might have indulged a bit too much ğŸ˜‚â€”totally worth it!
Nice bar nearby Taipei main station

My friends and I had a great time with the sweet and fun companies of the bartenders here. We are attracted to the chill-but-not-noisy ambience when we got in, and then amazed by their all female staff who are very friendly, helpful, and talkative. For the drinks, they did okay. We will certainly come back to try more and maybe try their daytime menu next timeğŸ˜‰
Great ambience and liquor, the tiramisu is delicious. If you order pizza, you need to be patient
One of my favorite bar in Taipei! Friendly staffs and owner, food is superb, cocktails and beverages are all good!

Wonderful breakfast spot where we came across that many locals were ordering from. Had some è›‹é¥¼s, èåœç³• and è±†æµ†, and they were simply delicious! Prepared on the spot by an elderly couple who were really friendly and the food was spot on 10/10!! would eat here everyday!ğŸ¤¤

Great breakfast spot run by an old couple
Decided to come here after seeing reviews and wasnâ€™t disappointed
The radish cake was very good and so was the sticky rice which was very filling
This isnâ€™t a popular place with tourists and Iâ€™m glad itâ€™s not. Thereâ€™s a lot of locals who come here too which indicates itâ€™s good
Also price is very cheap , even cheaper than buying bread from bread shop

Very good food, is a must to try, carrot cake need to add eggs, yummy, soya bean need to mix with the sesame drinks (ç¾äººï¼‰ very healthy, if can go without sugar is better, Chinese crepe with bacon n spring onion n cheese is excellent, soya with eggs is good to drink and glutinous rice with you Teow n pork floss, nice couple

Wonderful neighborhood spot that has been around for 38 years. Run by a lovely couple, the Taiwanese egg crepes, fantuan (sticky rice stuffed w pork floss, pickles and a crueler) and soy milk are made in house. Delicious!

The breakfast restaurant. Many locals like to stay here and enjoy their breakfast in the morning. Compared to other restaurants in Taipei city, they offer affordable meals.

They offer egg rolls with bacon, buns, soy milk and more. It costs below NTD50 each.

åç¨±: Youmou to Ohana Coffee SPOT Taipei Film House

ç†±é–€è©•è«–.text: I really love this European-style afternoon tea space. It perfectly combines historical architecture with a cafe, creating an authentic small European atmosphere. The white decor is absolutely beautiful. The menu offers a wide variety of sweet and savory options, and there was a special selection of cakes on display that day, which was delightful to see. It's a great place for a lovely afternoon tea with friends.

This was a nice find while on the hunt for a late evening restaurant. I had already eaten but my friend was hungry so I canâ€™t comment too much on the food but she said her beef curry was nice. The tea I got was unusual but I rather enjoyed the taste. My friend enjoyed her coffee with whipped cream. Nice ambiance inside. Good decor!

They have many coffee and dessert selections, and everything I had was enjoyable. Service was a bit slow but because they have many customers, and the cafe is usually full. Staff was very professional, kind and helpful. They accommodated us well. I like the interiors and ambiance of this place.

Nice environment but you clearly pay for it and way less for the food... Medium quantity, my pesto pasta was so watery and rather tasteless, I paid around 900nt for one person, the service was however fast and good

met a colleague from out of town here (2nd floor) during the summer. i got here first, the waitress showed me to a lovely sofa seater. it was a weekday afternoon so was pretty quiet. although right by the entrance, i had a view of the entire space, and out the windows, which was nice. lovely/retro decor with soft jazz(?) music that was unobtrusive. the waitress recommended a nice summery drink (but i cannot remember what it was now...) i did end up having two glasses, since it was good, and my colleague was nearly an hour late. i didn't try snacks, food, or anything else. will have to try next time. a good place to come for afternoon drinks, or meetings in the area. the downstairs tend to get loud/noisy, so i prefer the upstairs.

åœ°å€: No. 31è™Ÿ, Lane 77, Section 2, Zhongshan N Rd

ç†±é–€è©•è«–.text:
Lovely spot and lovely owners - but beware of weird pricing. I went in by myself for a quick beer ($200 on menu) and the place was pretty much empty.

Was given peanuts and edamame. I presumed they were either included or would come with a reasonable table charge (like $100 or something).

But it ended up costing me a total of $550. That is Â£13.50 - which is frankly outrageous for one bottle of beer. I was also not warned about the crazy extra charges.

I'm sure the lovely owner didn't mean to scam me - but she did. Please be clearer with pricing.

A very cozy jazz bar ğŸ¤
Loved the ambience and the jazz performances. The friendly owners make you feel very welcomed here.

Already looking forward to coming back.
Great place for jazz lovers! Owner is a music lover himself. Food cooked to order by the Mrs is excellent! Cozy atmosphere for drinks too. Love it!
What a fun jazz spot. An intimate space with great drinks and awesome music both live and otherwise. The owners have created a beautiful jazz atmosphere for chilling in.
Lovely couple running this small and cozy joint. Mostly Japanese customers and good selection of single malt whiskeys and glassware. =)
Careful, good quality, fair price

åœ°å€: No. 5è™Ÿ, Alley 36, Lane 30, Section 4, Xinyi Rd

ç†±é–€è©•è«–.text: The classroom is not far from Exit 5 of Daan MRT Station. The newly decorated classroom is beautiful and quiet. Teacher Sonia is kind, beautiful and teaches attentively. The sound of the live grand piano K. KAWAI is really nice.
The environment is very comfortable! There is a lot of space, so children wonâ€™t feel oppressed.

åœ°å€: No. 25è™Ÿ, Lane 101, Section 4, Zhongxiao E Rd

ç†±é–€è©•è«–.text: Project Keep Coffee Bar is an exciting new spot for coffee enthusiasts! The concept here revolves around the love of coffee, offering both classic options and some unique, creative ideas. One of the highlights is their tasting menu, where you can try three different cups of coffee brewed from the same beans but using different techniquesâ€”each cup offering a new flavor experience. They also serve snacks paired with the coffees to enhance the tasting experience. The vibe is relaxed and welcoming, making it the perfect place to hang out or dive deep into your coffee journey. Highly recommended for any coffee aficionado looking for something a little different!

First time came here with friends while we were looking for cafe to hangout. Didn't know it's a really nice place for coffee lover. The owner/s are very friendly and also a coffee experts sharing their knowledge about coffee. They are skillful and passionate about coffee and will make nice coffee that goes well with the small snacks. It is a fun experience for your taste buds and smell sense.

Nice cozy cafe in Daâ€™an District. Owner is extremely friendly and hospitable.

Good choices of coffee and brewing styleâ€¦ each come with pairing dessert..

This is a mesmerizing coffee trip that you will definitely come back to again and again.

Let me start by saying that I actually hate coffee.
No matter whether it is low-priced or high-priced coffee, I always get palpitations or dizziness after drinking it. Some are even so bitter that I feel like they taste like cigarette ash.

But what I must share is that I drank the entire coffee set at this place and still felt unsatisfied!

I like the elegant green tone of the entire store. The bar-style design allows guests to appreciate the eyes and techniques of the coffee staff who are focusing on carefully making coffee in front of them. Guests can also easily chat with every guest they meet by chance. I also like that it is obviously Coffee has ever-changing appearances, and I also like the unique snacks that go with each drink... Combining these preferences, I hope to recommend it to everyone to try.

This is already my second visit. Itâ€™s been just over a week since the last visit, and Iâ€™m already thinking about it! I think itâ€™s an art-level drink thatâ€™s worth trying~

Currently all charges in the store are cash!

A cozy cafe bar near Dunhua MRT Station
Today I ordered the Costa Rican Ice Cream
It has the aroma and sweetness of tropical fruits such as pineapple, and the aftertaste can taste like peachğŸ‘very delicious
Next time I want to meet friends to try desserts and Italian coffee
This spot always remind us travel Taipei again, love it very much!!

It's quite spicy when it's slightly spicy, but it won't be spicy anymore if you brush it with the soup.
Plenty of options and very affordable
The spring rolls look like black rolls with a little bit of carrot shavings inside.
Kelp and dried soybeans are less odorous
The soup is super fragrant. The spiciness is quite spicy. The price is medium to cheap. Highly recommended.

The taste of Chinese medicine is not obvious, but it is still delicious and there are many choices of dishes.
The boss is kind

The chicken gizzards have only been blanched and are too hard to eat.
The soup is not too salty, the vegetables are 30 yuan per portion, and the portion size is a bit mini. You can add minced garlic, but no chopped green onion/sauerkraut etc...

åœ°å€: No. 58, Lane 233, Section 1, Dunhua S Rd

ç†±é–€è©•è«–.text:
Delicious tacos my favorite are the pork and fish ones. The pasta and the and avocado toast are also very tasty!

A very homey feel to the restaurant, in a great location. Nice spot to have a nice dinner or brunch!

Went there for brunch. I'm french but OMG the chef has a heavy hand on salt, even the salad was salted. Overall the experience wasn't that great and it was a deception. The hot mocha was barely warm and the food looked a little sad.

Wouldn't recommend considering food experience and price.

They were out of avocado toast when we visited, so I went with the sausage pasta instead. It looks a bit small but itâ€™s flavorful and pretty filling (for me, at least). However, their food is a bit pricey.

Foodie heaven but donâ€™t order the burger! They serve chicken broth at the start which is fantastic. The edamame humus is always delicious but it doesnâ€™t come with enough bread :( They use Purebread Bakery which hs amazing sourdough bread. The bbq pork belly melts in your mouth and the greens served with it is perfectly seasoned. I tried their burger and I was completely unimpressed. It was completely cooked through and with nothing special in their seasoning at all.

Im back again, of course! Every time returning to Taipei, its my must go place tk enjoy outdoor dining which is popular in europe but not so much in Taiwan. Love this restaurant: food, service, people......
A wonderful place to relax! Music is so nice and the waitress and waiter are pretty kind. Also can make u special drinks. I would like to introduce my friend to visit it again.
A cozy bar and a good pre drink spot with Taipei city view.

You have to issue invoices ç™¼ç¥¨ï¼ˆ not receipts) even if your customers donâ€™t ask for one. You do business here and youâ€™re obliged to pay your profit-seeking enterprise income tax in case you arenâ€™t aware of the importance of issuing invoices for the obligation and responsibility afterwards.

So nice place, wonderfull view on 1o1 and TaÃ¯peÃ¯, you ll find a lounge, friendly and chic atmosphere. Seated a the bar or near the big windows, youâ€™ll enjoy signature cocktails with a french touch are absoltly amazing
A place to discover and to get back !
Great view, friendly staff, prefect crafted cocktails and a chill vibe to meet new people. I recommend

Everything was delicious and perfect for sharing. The chef and staffs were also super friendly and interactive-- making the experience even more memorable.

highly recommend the lamb chops, beef tongue, and duck breast!

Everything was more than fantasticğŸ¤¤ğŸ¤¤
Food, Service and the ambience is amazing and unforgettable ğŸ˜
I canâ€™t wait to try the rest of the menu tomorrow againâ™¥ï¸
Especially the owners are very welcoming and caring! I would definitely recommend this restaurant if you are looking for some terrific experience!
Everything was super delicious! Especially the beef tartar, carbonara and the tiramisu! It is the perfect dinner for Friday night. I still think this is the best Italian food in Taipei!

Iâ€™ve been coming to this place for around 3 years, and hands down, it has become my favorite Italian restaurant in TaipeiğŸ©·ğŸ·
I mean, not only the food is delicious, but the service is on point, and even when I eat there alone, I always have a great experience.
Petra, the manager, is very friendly and professional. She always comes over and checks on you if you need anything and has a conversation with you so you feel appreciated. And sheâ€™d always recommend a perfect wine according to your taste - never missed it ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€
I came here on many occasions: dates, friendâ€™s birthdays, and solo dinners - and it was a great and delicious experience every time!

Loved the atmosphereâ€¦cozy place, perfect for hanging with a couple friends or a date!

Appetizers were all well-cooked and seasoned properly. I was very impressed with the t-bone- perfect temperature, taste, and medium rare. We asked for wine suggestions to go with the steak and it paired super well.

åœ°å€: No. 21, Alley 11, Lane 216, Section 4, Zhongxiao E Rd

ç†±é–€è©•è«–.text: This is the expat place! Awesome food, awesome vibes, trivia night was a blast. Thank guys, will definitely make this my local whenever in Taiwan

Good food, good vibes, and excellent service.
On Tap is all you need on a Friday night out with your mates. You can play pool and dots with random customers here. Such a fun night out â¤ï¸

This bar is fantastic, especially with its inviting patio â€“ a must when the weather's warm. The diverse clientele and English-labeled menus create a welcoming atmosphere, while the staff's English proficiency adds to the convenience. Specializing in a global beer selection, the extensive food choices are noteworthy, though a suggestion would be to swap shredded lettuce on the classic nachos for pico de gallo, corn, guacamole, sour cream, onions, and jalapeÃ±o. The friendly staff and delightful piÃ±a colada ensure I'll be back if given the opportunity.

Nice and cozy place. Choice of tap beers is not huge, but descent. I really liked their mushroom burger for it's huge juicy tasty peace of meat. The burger has its own taste which does not interfere with nice taste of meat. Strongly recommend.

Finding a British Pub in Taiwan was amazing for us. From the draft beer and food, to the service and atmosphere, everything was amazing and well catered for. We loved the feeling of being back in the UK even for a short time. The food was very authentic and delicious and the beer was exactly as i'd expect in a UK Pub. Thank you for a little trip 'home' during our Taiwan adventure!

ç†±é–€è©•è«–.text: Great aromatic taro flavour. I wish i bought more pieces as the flavour is hard to find in other stores.

If you love taro, donâ€™t miss it. The little stall looks inconspicuous, but itâ€™s amazing when you eat it.

The taro cake (35 yuan) is not overly sweet. The taro paste is thick and solid, and the taro flavor is dense and light, leaving a sweet taste in your mouth.

(2024/8/17)
ğŸ”–Taro cake
The taro puree should be mixed with other things, it is not pure taro puree, but the amount is quite sufficient and it is delicious! People who love taro will probably love it.

Rice cake (2 slices per serving) $35

You can actually see fried rice cakes being sold in Taipei City
(The proprietress happened to be cutting rice cakes. It felt quite fresh and the stall looked very clean, so I ordered one to try.)
Itâ€™s fried to order and eaten right after you get it. Itâ€™s really delicious!
The skin is crispy, not greasy, and the oil has no strange smell.
Simple snack ~ just right and deliciousğŸ‘ğŸ»

Visit during the afternoon on weekends
Because I saw another customer waiting in front of me, I wasnâ€™t sure how much she ordered, so I first asked how long it would take to order a rice cake.

The papaya milk is 55 yuan for a medium cup. It is delicious. It is made fresh by the boss. It is sugar-free, not too sweet, and has a strong milky taste. It is very fresh!

The urban legend is true
The rose lemon drink is really smooth after drinking it.
The boss will also thoughtfully ask if you have ever drank rose drink.
Please take it with cautionâ˜ºï¸

I ordered the second place rose lemon drink. Although it was not unpleasant to drink, I had watery diarrhea immediately after drinking it and was so scared that I went to the emergency room. Later, I checked online and found that people with sensitive stomachs will suffer from diarrhea if they drink rose lemon drink, but the store clerk did not tell them that it would cause diarrhea, and there was no sign on it.

There is a short boy with a watermelon rind haircut (no tattoos) who speaks very rudely

I really canâ€™t tell if thereâ€™s a queue or not.
I approached the stall and asked politely if I could order directly now?
He immediately replied to me and said no! Go to the back and line up!

Super question mark? If there are customers waiting in line, you can tell me.
I didn't mean to jump in line.

Peach Oolong $55
Fixed sweetness slightly iced
There is Peach himself, it tastes deliciousğŸ˜‹

The vermicelli is a bit less spicy but still pretty good

Food: We ordered a pasta and a lamb plate to share. The portion is about right but some people may think itâ€™s not enough. Love the pasta texture and seasoning, very on spot. The lamb is tender as well. Unfortunately we werenâ€™t able to try the menu we wanted as weâ€™ve been told theyâ€™re out of ingredients even we dined at 6:30pm.

Service: The staff are all foreigners. English will be a better option to communicate here.

Atmosphere: it was a Sunday night yet very quiet and good to have some talk with my friend. Recommend for couples and small group.

Food is OK, not much surprise and not much to recollect. For us, appetizers are quite under seasoning. Sorry to say this but service is quite poor and unprofessional for an Italian restaurant. At the beginning we ordered salmon and fig appetizer (it turned out to be a salad dish) and beef tartare, waitress recommended us to order salad and we followed her recommendation. It turned out we have too much green for appetizer. Then when we ordered the tenderloin, we asked if itâ€™s beef or pork, the waitress answered â€œporkâ€ while it is obviously beef when it was servedâ€¦ During the lunch time the restaurant is never full but it seemed HARD to get waitressâ€™s attention to look after our needs. And it was the cook that reminds waitress to replace our dirty plates!!! Thereâ€™s zero introduction when every dish is served as wellâ€¦ Iâ€™m sorry but this experience really makes us quite disappointedâ€¦

This is our second visit, and the food remains consistently outstanding. We savored the burrata adorned with fresh salmon and figs â€“ a delightful blend of flavors. The red prawn linguine, crafted with handmade pasta, boasted a sauce bursting with flavor, accentuating the richness of the prawns. It's undoubtedly the finest rendition of this dish we've sampled in the city. The lamb chops, coated in a pistachio crust, were a revelation, marrying the tang of mustard and vinegar with the inherent succulence of the meat. Each bite offered a delightful contrast of textures. Moreover, the generous portions offered excellent value, making this establishment stand out among its Italian counterparts.

While the staff members are undoubtedly friendly, their casual demeanor sometimes extends to chatting and using their cell phones in the kitchen, which may affect the overall ambiance. Additionally, the lighting could be improved by dimming it slightly and incorporating warmer tones, as the current bright, yellow light doesn't quite create the desired atmosphere. The music, while lively, can at times be too loud, giving the impression of being in a bar rather than a dining establishment. Adjusting these elements could enhance the overall dining experience

Great place to experience authentic Italian cuisine!
Amazing food(the Tuna tartar blew our mind!)
Fabulous service
The atmosphere and the music choices were all fantastic !
A little pricey but is a must visit!

The pasta, entree, salad, and fish are all good. There is a small problem that main courses of beef and pork are not available tonight. They are the items I would like to try ğŸ¤”
Maybe next time
Services are quite slow when full house.
This cup of Yunnan coffee is full of floral aroma. The cold outside can't suppress the spring inside.
The boss is handsome and the drinks are great
Delicious!

This breakfast spot in the Xinyi area is a hidden gem~
What sets them apart is their unique take on danping, featuring a delightfully crispy skin. The menu even boasts special flavors like danping with kimchi pork.
What's more, the place is impeccably clean, ensuring you won't leave smelling like your meal. Highly recommended if you're in the mood for a different and delicious breakfast experience!

åœ°å€: No. 4è™Ÿ, Alley 8, Lane 36, Section 5, Minsheng E Rd

ç†±é–€è©•è«–.text: I love this coffee shop itâ€™s so stylish and perfect for relaxing. It has a great view of the park, clean and also great energy. Thereâ€™s a room that can sit 9+ people and the chairs are so comfortable. I think one of them is even imported from Italy! I got the iced coffee and it is perfect, not too sweet. Love this place!!

Really cool spot to chill and shop. Lovely decor and the staff is super friendly and knowledgable and helped me pick out accessories and shoes. I got to taste the special limited edition coffee from Japan which was unreal.
The overall vibe was awesome, highly recommend.
Fantastic boutique with a unique selection and an inviting atmosphere. The Japanese coffee is a standout. A must-visit for both shopping and a delightful coffee experience!

A chic place to chill
Come here to spoil your taste buds with black coffee
amazing selection shop with excellent Japanese brew coffee.

Wanted to test this out for the experience I guess, hereâ€™s my take on it :
- the MOS stores are quite old, not as new as the conventional fast food in Europe and this one was okay but not that clean either. Itâ€™s not super comfortable but itâ€™s acceptable.
- The concept is innovative I guess? Never tasted such rice burgers but itâ€™s not delicious .. just newâ€¦ and itâ€™s not inexpensive
- It felt pretty industrial, especially the chicken nuggets : I didnâ€™t like themâ€¦
- the employees were very kind and helpful

Overall good experience but would not come back, there  are a lot of better food spot options in taipei!

This is my second time having mos in general. The lady was patient in helping me order which was nice. The burger was actually really good and exceeded my expectations. Really crispy fries. Iâ€™m glad Taiwanese can do a good burger.
Good food, cheap price. Easy to use menu. Upstairs is cozy to sit down.

The attitude of the Male Store Manager was not friendly and arrogant.
Weâ€™re a regular customer of this branch and on 3 occasions we have experienced the behavior of this manager in his treatment of his coworkers.
in my situations, i just happened to change my choice of coffee from hot to cold, upon switching, his voice or tone of speaking becomes irritated, by asking us in a different manners.
I suggest that the owner needs to check this matter.

The store obviously does not have enough labor for the amount of the customer. It's 12:30 but only one counter is opened. The cashier has to place the order, deliver the dine in meal and fill the drink at the same time.

The owner should seriously consider to hire more employees.

This is the worst MOS burger I have visited in Taiwan.

If you want that iconic neo alleyway photo of the Taipei 202, this is the spot! Overall itâ€™ll take you about 20 minutes to walk here from the Taipei 101 (or 15 minutes from the Xiangshan metro station). Itâ€™s fairly straightforward to find and the view is quite nice. Be prepared to wait your turn as there are usually several photographers here at any time (particularly just after dark). Be respectful of those posing for shots, but also of nearby restaurants (like the one with the two red lanterns on the right). There is usually foot traffic going up or down the alley as well as scooters and automobiles passing, so donâ€™t stand in the road. The sidewalk has enough height to allow for a good framing of the Taipei 101. Good shots in the day, better at night, but be aware the Taipei 102 building turn off at 10pm; so plan your shots.
Amazing view of Taipei 101 between an old fashioned alley. Stunning photos and lots of people.

Great spot, clean and fresh food. It has all the menu items you expect from a Taiwanese breakfast spot, but the lighting and decor details, and with the music playing, the experience is elevated to more of a brunch feel. I drank my soy milk from a mug and I can't remember the last time I did that

Probably the best breakfast Iâ€™ve had in Taiwan. Everything was made fresh to order. My only issue was the glacial pace to be seated and then receive the food. It was well over 30 minutes before the food arrived.
Went around 10 plus on a weekday, got a seat immediately. Service was fast and food was good. Burger set was value for money.
Very good local breakfast. Come early or you need to queue.
Clean and a lot of choices! Love the food and will visit again!

I went on a pilgrimage today. Although I didnâ€™t pick out a style that suited my style, there were really a lot of things on display, and the store clerkâ€™s service was very good and friendly. I will go there again.
I have passed by several times and it happened to be raining today and I drove by. The atmosphere in the store is quite good. But I hope there can be more product displays
Very comfortable
The frozen lemon tea is delicious. The boss uses fresh lemons to squeeze it. The making process seems hygienic and it is very convenient to use linepay.

a shop assistant wearing a hat
I kept rolling my eyes crazily, not knowing why I was upset!
The movement is super slow...it doesn't matter, we can wait!
But the bad attitude is really intolerableğŸ¤©

I told him I wanted two bags and he still rolled his eyes in displeasure. Itâ€™s not like he didnâ€™t payğŸ‘ğŸ»

It is recommended that you do not visit

If you donâ€™t want to open a store, I suggest you take the store back home and take a good rest ^_^ Every day is a typhoon holidayğŸ¶ğŸµğŸ¸ğŸ¥

The boss is cool and not very communicative, but I really wanted to drink a hand-cranked drink, so I ordered 2 cups of winter melon and lemon. It turned out that the boss used fresh lemons to squeeze the juice, and the aroma of the lemon kept coming, although the drink was not very good. Cheap but really delicious

Lemon rose drink is a good thing to cleanse the stomach
Be sure to drink it when you get home to avoid the trouble of water leakage outsideğŸ¤£
I will buy it once every 1-2 weeks. I highly recommend the papaya milk and it tastes great, but the watermelon juice tastes like water and tastes badğŸ˜…
The first time I bought watermelon juice at Jingmei Night Market, it was not freshly squeezed.

Atmosphere is warm and cozy, service is spot on, very attentive and precise, food is simple and well executed,gratin dauphinois and onion soup were very well execute(i am french), steak is awesome, only cons is portion a bit too small and dessert not at the level of the rest of the meal. But overall a great experience for the price .

The food is overall delicious, especially dry aged rib eye steak. The service is a bit of a pity that there are some mis-served items. The waiter who introduced the menu is a bit frivolous. Maybe that's a way of humor but we did not get it.

I have dined at 168 Prime a fair number of times--both in groups and solo, and each time it has been a uniquely great experience.  Food, beverages, atmosphere always perfect.  But by far the best aspect is the service.  Each member of 168's staff is professional, kind, and gracious.  But the stand-out is Mr. Lester Lin.  Lester remembers every tiny detail--is humorous--charming--will go out of his way to make an occasion special.  He also really knows his stuff and can pair a wine to go with just about anything.  There's a reason this place is always packed!

I've heard a lot about the famous steakhouse for a long time, but when I finally went, I was a bit disappointed. The food was okay, and the atmosphere was fine, but it didn't quite live up to its reputation.

Pleasant location with a view of greenery with typical Taiwan skillet steak - couldn't find one with the right balance of marbling as it was either too much or too little.  Good pan fried seafood appetizers and soup.

Great spot for a mellow cocktail outside on the 3rd floor.  Bill mixes quality beverages.  First time trying a Penicillin, and I'm hooked.  We will be back for more drinks and to see if the food is as good.  Definitely a 5 star spot for a relaxing Saturday evening cocktail session.

I have wanted to try this place ever since I moved back to Taiwan.  But it was fully booked the first two times I tried to visit.  Finally, we got a table on a weekday afternoon for late lunch.  But the place didnâ€™t disappoint me at all.  First of all, my complements to the talented young chefs.  Their culinary skills and creativity earned my total respect right from the start.  The selection of cold cuts paired with honey grilled brie cheese is just Ingenious.  All the fusion dishes we had were made to perfection.  We truly enjoyed the experience!

I came here for a drink date with an old friend. It was a freezing day; the restaurant was very generous+humanized and allowed me to have a seat when I arrived before they opened.
The wine selection offers one-for-one from 5:30-7:30 pm. The waiter provided a storybook liked hand-drawn guide for cocktails, introducing the background/ origin, types of the spirit used, and the taste of each cocktail, very informative.
The roof top is quite a romantic spot but I wonâ€™t pop up to take a look as itâ€™s freezing cold to me. Would definitely come again during summer time.

We went to Lazy Point for dinner. 2nd floor is an indoor dining area, 3rd floor is an outdoor bar. The meals we ordered met our expectations in every way. The chicken wings and truffle fries were both top-notch. Their New York strip steak was excellent. It was flavorful and incredibly delicious. The only area that needs improvement for the establishment is the service. I'll return to sample their other drinks and cocktails again!

Lazy point really built a cozy feeling, no matter table or chair. It is not just a restaurant also sell some plates and other little things. No matter what the point is dishes good enough to give a try. I would suggest to visit here if you love western food. Bright place, light mood.

Iâ€™m really scared to death by Rose Lemon. Although it tastes good, I can only lie on the hotel bed waiting for the call of the toilet. Two anti-diarrheal pills canâ€™t stop it. Fortunately, the hotel has a toilet without treatment...

Ban Ban has warned me that I will have diarrhea, so I really have to be disobedient...
I want to cry... There is only water left to poop, uh uh...

Update: It took a total of four antidiarrheal pills to stop it.

I bought a glass of rose lemon drink. The store warned some people that drinking it would cause gastrointestinal discomfort. I thought about it, wouldnâ€™t it just cause diarrhea? It should be fine, right? I said it didnâ€™t matter and I wanted to order a drink. I took a sip and it was really fragrant with roses and lemon base. It was delicious and delicious. Before I finished shopping at the night market, I felt gastrointestinal peristalsis. As soon as I got back to Canada, I had diarrhea. I had diarrhea nearly 10 times and then I had diarrhea. Water..., I didnâ€™t expect the effect to be so strong. I wonâ€™t worry about constipation in the future. The rose lemon drink is really delicious, but I will buy it and drink it at home.

A bit sweet but the drink is the best
Itâ€™s okay. Multiple payment is very convenient.

The drink is delicious. I bought three cups a day. However, before purchasing the rose drink, I was warned that drinking it may cause gastrointestinal discomfort. After returning to Hsinchu, I really had diarrhea... but it is really effective in clearing the stomach! However, the other tea drink owners didnâ€™t ask about the sweetness, so we just drank it all with sugar! The frozen lemon tea is delicious, the tea is fragrant ~ but itâ€™s too sweet (usually no sugar)

This frozen lemon tea is only 55 yuan, but it comes with a whole lemon, which is super cool
And itâ€™s super delicious and cost-effective. The rice cakes are made with brown sugar and thereâ€™s a lot of them.

The service is good and the pearls are not too sweet. They are delicious. I bought them specifically for the fragrant but not too sweet pearls.

The Fen Kueh frozen lemon tea is delicious. It is freshly pressed with fresh lemons and you can still drink the pulp. Great! The price of 60 yuan for a large cup is relatively affordable compared to many handheld drinks shops. I will want to buy it again! I want to try the new milk tea series next time~~~
I bought two drinks and they were both delicious. I will definitely buy this drink shop in Alley 737 in the future!
This time I ordered the jelly grass silky fresh milk tea. It was delicious~ the jelly grass was very smooth and tender~~

Itâ€™s great if a young boss has experience and enthusiasm for starting a businessğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»
The lo mein is delicious and goes perfectly with soft-boiled eggs!

The food tastes good. The West Toast is probably the best one I have eaten in Taiwan so farğŸ‘ğŸ»The lo mein and shrimp dumplings are also good, but they are a bit oily. It would be better to add less sesame oil; the frozen lemon tea is not enough Sweet taste, not the ordinary sweet lemon black teağŸ‘ğŸ»

The price is relatively favorable and the taste is ok. I will patronize it again.

The meals are freshly prepared and will take a while. It is recommended to eat if you are not in a hurry.
Everything is served hot and you can see that they put a lot of thought into the food.
The signature lo mein is a bit spicy, the egg yolk is half-cooked, and the cabbage is also delicious.
The custard bun is a bit oily and feels oily when you bite it.
Chicken wings have a special aroma, like lemon flavor
All in all, I highly recommend coming here to eat and itâ€™s not expensive!

I had a great experience at this vet clinic. The staff were incredibly nice and attentive, taking the time to make sure my baby was comfortable and well cared for. The clinic itself was spotless and well-organized, giving me confidence in their professionalism and attention to detail. Overall, their combination of cleanliness, professionalism, and compassionate care makes this clinic a top choice for any pet owner.
Friendly staff at the counter, the clinic is clean, and the doctor is very gentle and speaks English. We will definitely come here next time we need it. We've found our new vet !

The team of doctors and assistants at Guangdian take good care of the animals. Ponyo was admitted to the hospital due to an incorrect diagnosis of infection after surgery in another hospital. Dr. Li initially took over the care. Dr. Huang was busy because he was originally suspected of having a heart problem. I helped scan the heart and did an ultrasound to confirm that there was no heart condition, and then Director Lin helped clean the wound in a full clinic.
The entire process was done professionally and with appropriate care.
During my hospitalization, I also saw that my condition was getting better and better every day.
Thanks to the three doctors for their help, Ponyo got through this difficult time.
Guangdian Animal Hospital is highly recommendedğŸ‘ğŸ¿ğŸ‘ğŸ¿ğŸ‘ğŸ¿

My cat's eyes have been infected with feline herpes virus and have been suffering from conjunctivitis and ulcers. I went to several animal hospitals for medication, but antibiotics were ineffective. The eyes also became inflamed and leaked tissue fluid. I felt very distressedğŸ˜­
I accidentally saw the reviews of Guangdian Animal Hospital and wanted to give it a try again with my cat. Unexpectedly, Dr. Wangâ€™s careful examination and accurate prescription of medicine finally made the catâ€™s eyes slowly return to their previous appearance. We are really happy. Happy and sincerely grateful to Dr. Guangdian WangğŸ™

My dog â€‹â€‹at home is feeling unwell. A friend introduced me to Light Point. The environment is very bright and clean and the dog will not be nervous!

During the consultation process, we were very worried about the condition of our precious dog, so we had many questions. But the doctor was very patient and explained it to us in detail slowly, which made us feel very reassured â¤ï¸

Every doctor and nurse in the clinic is very gentle, professional and neat. Not long after the operation, the dog was smiling happilyğŸ˜š

Thank you Dr. Huang, Dr. Wang and the director for helping my baby conduct a careful health checkup and complete the surgeryâ¤ï¸

Bring your parents together to experience Zen Soft classes.
The teacher is very patient and attentive, and can adjust his movements at any time according to the situation. There is no pressure in the class and it is full of rewardsğŸ˜Š
The hand-brewed coffee is also greatğŸ‘
Have a drink after class, perfect setâ¤ï¸

Very good studio. I work as an equestrian instructor. I have some problems with body soreness and insufficient muscle strength. After consultation and training, they have been improved. The stiff shoulders and necks and headaches caused by management have been improved through red rope training. Training and control, improving muscle tension and stiffness, practicing multiple times, finding the proper positions of various parts of the body, and improving the drive and control of nerves. I gained a lot, and I also recommend the studioâ€™s Pei Cha Latte, which is slightly sweet and delicious. â¤ï¸

Because adjusting the physical fitness gives the body a new feeling, it can achieve a more perfect angle in this movement... When necessary, teachers are invited to come to the stadium for on-site mechanical assessment. It is really amazing and refreshing to find the key points! Looking forward to my future performance!
Great studio, comfortable and clean environment, experienced red rope exercise and thought it was great!

I once discussed the situation of the game with my seniors and watched me play. It was pointed out that there may be a problem with the connection of the body. I have heard of red ropes but never experienced them, so I wanted to come over and give it a try. , the result was that it solved the problem that I had been uncomfortable with for a long time, it was amazing! Under the guidance of the teacher, I regained the strength that needed to be controlled, at the cost of being very sore... But slowly I connected the body and felt more stable when playing ball...
After drinking the smallest cup of brown sugar pearl fresh milk in history that can be held in one hand, the cat was dumbfounded. Fortunately, the pearls are quite soft.

Friends with constipation highly recommend rose lemon tea
Very helpful in defecation, comparable to laxatives
The boss has always emphasized not to try it easily.
The effect is very good
At the drink stall in the night market, I ordered a cup of Zhenye Alpine Green. The sweetness is fixed, the amount of ice is slightly iced, and the taste is delicious.

I have never tried other items, and I hope to have a chance to try it, but the papaya milk is really watery...
I spent 65 on a drink that turned out to be papaya milk....
Really rare

The floor of the store is extremely dirty and wet, and the ice bucket is thrown on the ground. When I buy a cup of lemon tea, I purposely donâ€™t take out the lemon peel, which makes the whole drink taste bad and bitter. Itâ€™s a shame to spend money, and the boss will talk to himself while doing it. drinks

I went to Yangmingshan last March 2024 hoping to witness the blooming of  cherry blossom trees since it has been one of my bucket list. Weather in Taipei that time was quite rainy but still I tried to visit Yangmingshan the next day perhaps I could still find some cherry blossoms.To my surprise, this is what I sawğŸ˜ Beautiful pink yoshino cherry blossoms were in full bloomğŸŒ¸ğŸŒ¸ğŸŒ¸I am speechless & blessed to witness this view ğŸ’—This is not exactly at the Park but you can pass through this area located on the right side of the road going to Yangmingshan flower park. This place is also a perfect spot for Sakura viewing.
Quite temple

You can see the fireworks and drone shows at Fisherman's Wharf, and the direction of the drone show is the same as that seen from the dock auditorium, so there will be no problem of being unable to read the words in reverse. Walking up or down the temple, there is a point where you can overlook Fisherman's Wharf. The upper point is next to the road that turns left upwards, but the grass is very high. The lower point is on the hillside of the Guanyin Statue, where the view is wider but is obstructed by telephone poles. The view is actually quite far, but at least there won't be any traffic jams. Turn right up there and there is a grocery store where you can buy food and borrow a toilet.
You can see the scenery of Tamsui and Bali, and the cool wind is blowing, which is great!
Fishermanâ€™s Wharf Fireworks Photography Spot, please observe photo etiquette and do not step on flowers, grass, or trees.
It's so quiet here and the scenery is very good. From here, the view of Taipei Harbor is closer and more beautiful. Unfortunately, the visibility is not good today.
good place, like a museum you can go chill and buy foods and tea's here. good place to explore with family, you can try to make a pottery inside,many activities to do in a busy weekdays!
A big plaza with tons of ceramic and potteries, as well as the paintings. On this Sunday there was a famous calligrapher doing his work for free for some fans.
They have many small art shops and galleries here. But I guess most visitors only come here to use restrooms.
Interesting mall (?)

A integrated store is ceramics street. The entry is a big furnace. You can see poster and old CDs there.
On second floor, the stores and small stalls there. The toilet is very clean.

Had a great night here. Great party and complimentary food grilled fresh outside. A very nice and expensive cut of beef was grilled to perfect temperature and complimentary to guests. Also, they made pork, chicken, and other treats fresh of the grill. The drinks were mixed perfectly and a great assortment of bottled beers. The owner was attentive to us even tho we sat outside. Was quick to be friendly and joke around and have a nice night with us as well. Good vibes, decent food, and a comparatively cheap price. Canâ€™t argue with that. Thanks Nathan for your hospitality and happy 50!

IG: foodie_foxx
The best resto dive bar in taoyuan, actually we were bar hopping as all the bars in taoyuan were so depressing.
We were Glad that we came to this bar. The bartender was very welcoming and cheerful.
Cloe was her name. She makes amazing drinks, haha exactly as you wanted it to be.
They have this huge menu with all kinds of funny and popular cocktails..
Ohhh we were so full, so we could not taste their food, their food menu was awesome, we are again going to-day to just have dinner haha .
Cheers fellows
Bon appetite
Peace âœŒï¸ â˜®ï¸ ğŸ•Š

I went to the diner several times, and the previous experience was amazing. However, today I ordered French fries and seafood pizza, and I could tell the French fries, which taste vanilla, is different from those I had before. I guess the sources of the French fries have been altered due to inflation . On top of that, the crust of the pizza is way too dry. The lettuce in the beef roll was even replaced with some kind of unknown veggie, a hardcore disappointment really.
Hopefully the owner could find something wrong with the new meals.
Best place to drink and enjoy the plates with drinks. Owner Nathan is a very friendly person and so good to talk to. He makes the pizzas and chicken wings with great buffalo sauce.

Will never go back to this place!
Owner was really disrespectful!
Spend over 10 000k at this place last night with all my guests.
In my group were two Japanese tourists visiting Taiwan. I bought 2 Japanese beers for them at 7-11 and the owner treated us like trash!!
If he had any decency asking us why or just tell us nicely itâ€™s not permitted we wouldâ€™ve apologized and thatâ€™s it. But swearing at us and basically chasing us away from his restaurant, after spending all that money, was just awful!! We were there from 5:30pm until 12pm and the staff was amazing. Maybe they should be the owners!!

Hidden in a skate park behind the flower market, its advantage is that it is completely waterproof. It is a little airtight but acceptable. You can play your own music next to it. There are 60cm and 90cm tables that allow beginner and intermediate players to practice many different movements. There is a parking lot at the back, so you don't have to worry about this part whether you have a motorcycle or a car. The floor is quite smooth but not too slippery. There is a little too much mud. This part is a balanced report. Overall, it is highly recommended. It is a skatepark with a very high C/P value. I recommend it to everyone.

ç†±é–€è©•è«–.text: Beautiful scenery
It takes about 10 minutes to walk on a rugged stone road. Elders should especially be reminded to walk slowly, otherwise they may slip and sprain easily!
The scenery is beautiful and worth a visit
The scenery is very beautiful and the transportation is convenient
The weather is also very good

Wushi Port is the best surfing paradise in northern Taiwan, with its blue sea and blue sky, it is famous far and wide. Waves of waves are constantly rushing to the shore, attracting surfers to come and enjoy the fun of surfing.

There seems to be no stopping point here, and there is no stop sign on site.
After the opposite bus passed in front of me, I waited for 40 minutes for the return bus to come but no one came. I checked the location of the bus on Google Maps and found that the return bus had already left the city from nowhere.
Great surfing area

Most customers are from the local community in Yilan and the owner lives in the same complex. I had to knock on his door and he came out and took me next door to his coffee spot, where he even roasts beans himself.  He is incredibly passionate about how to taste flavors through temperature and letting flavors come out over time.  Lovely place to learn more about pour over and try different flavors!

Very knowledgeable and friendly owner who will explain in detail the different coffee notes and reasons for his choices. Chill and cosy with a quaint garden which is beautifully maintained. Will definitely be back!
Owner is very nice and this place is really cozy!

Share some private attractions, it would be a pity not to come
Super high CP value. If you come to Yilan, you will definitely go there. In addition to the countryside scenery,
The coffee is handmade, and my husband couldnâ€™t put it down. You can also order it a la carte on the spot and taste the difference of different beans.
The boss and his wife are very kind and hospitable, and their detailed explanations allowed us to better understand the flavor of each bean.
The scenery nearby is beautiful, and there are shrimps and other ecology in the stream next to the store.
Every time I drink it, I buy some more.
It should be noted that if you want to go there during the epidemic, you must contact us before going to confirm the number of people and business hours.

The aroma of coffee makes people want to drink it again. The quiet environment is a place where you can completely relax yourself. Also, the boss and his wife are very humane. A cafe worth visiting again.

A very nice hilltop cafe! There is a entrance fee but you can use to rebate it off food in the restaurant. Ordering is self service and payment have to be made upon ordering. The outdoor is beautiful and you can take photos at night.

Sometime the staff will put fireworks to get more people to come here. Itâ€™s really a nice place and the food is great.

Honestly the view is great when the weather is nice, enviroment is clean, however few foods are actually good to eat, some are a bit dry, but overall A great place to eat and take pictures lol, Would recommend going here!
I do really love the ambiance here the lightning and the overlooking view was great. The entrance fee is 100NT and consumables into drinks.
